name: Magyker Duels- Game Jam Version
description:
This is a project made for KSU's Fall 2019 Game Jam by team MK-ACT consisting of Matthew Watson, Kenny Tran, Andrew Whitfield, Chase Peery, and Tyler Jones. Enjoy!

CONTROLS:

P1: Arrow keys = movement, M,N,B,V = attack

P2: Left Stick = movement, face buttons = attack
